ABOUT THE EVENT

The mission of the DMVSTREAM.COM Nova Challenge is to bring together neighboring counties in a friendly rivalry that showcases boys’ basketball talent in Northern Virginia.  The top seniors from Fairfax, Loudoun, Arlington, and Prince William Counties and the City of Alexandria will compete against one another in a dunk contest, 3 point contest and two all-star games.  Follow us on twitter for the latest updates. @NovaChallenge .

Date:              Sunday, April 10th   2016

Location:      Marshall High School  (7731 Leesburg Pike, Falls Church, Va. 22043)

Schedule:    9-Noon -  Underclassmen Clinic sponsored by Evolution Basketball

                      2 PM -      Arlington/Alexandria vs. Prince William Game

                      4 PM -      3 PT and Dunk Contests

                      5 PM -      Loudoun vs. Fairfax Game

Admission: $7

2015 EVENT SUMMARY

We would like to thank everyone who came to this year's Nova Challenge. Your support helped us raise over $1200 for the Loudoun Abused Women's Shelter.  In addition, we would like to thank everyone who made Sunday run smoothly: Evolution Basketball, Cardinal Officials Association, Nova Cavaliers and Legit Sport Stats.  Also, our incredible sponsors Marlow Sports, BLT T-Shirt Printers and Virginia Ground Covers. Without their support, the Nova Challenge would not have been possible. 

2015 RESULTS

Fairfax 122   Loudoun 110

3 Point Champion- Jason Jolly (Stone Bridge HS)

Dunk Champion- Tyler Barton (Fairfax HS)

Loudoun MVP- Jason Jolly (Stone Bridge HS)

Fairfax MVP- Tyvez Monroe (Edison HS)
